name: Bundle Drones
description: Bundle Drones is a short game I made for a school project. I had very limited time so many ideas were cut due to time. There will be bugs. At the current time you just fly around and collect all the coins before time runs out. There are 5 levels in total. I'll admit, it's not fun in the slightest, but it works. And right now that's all that is important because I had a deadline. If people actually care about this I'll make some big updates.
